Summary: Morrison CO bright fireball-like star hovering and approaching, then made hard right and slowly disappeared
divs: sighting detailswas standing in the cul-de-sac outside our house (near littleton, co) when we saw a giant orange ball in the sky looking south\southeast. husband said "what is that?" and we watched it for a good 30 seconds before he went to get the neighbor. all 3 of us stood outside and watched this ball of gold and then it made a hard right (east) and slowly disappeared\dimmed\shrunk to nothingness.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Morrison
There were no other sightings in Morrison on or around March 12th 2012
